name: 2048 - Empty World
description:
2048 is a small prototype game made for "My First Game Jam: Winter 2022" it is small and unpolished. I'll most likely come back to this later on in time. It was fun to make.

It is a run of this mill top-down adventure in a baron-empty world. Enjoy the sceneary.

Due to time constraints and me being a solo dev there ain't a lot going on, it's small and unpolished but I'm proud of what I do have and like I said ill most likely come back to this at a later date and see what else I come up with.

The concept I was aiming for was the idea of waking up during a rapture like event after nature had taken back the world mankind was destroying and learning to live amongst the rubble
